Package sep.gaia.state

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AbstractStateManager
    Interface to manage the different categories of states by updating all states whenever one of them is changed.
    StateObserver
    Interface to be implemented in order to observe instances of subclasses of State.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GeoState
    Class to represent the state of the earth in geographic coordinates.
    GLState
    Class to represent and manage all aspects of the state that are essential for the rendering process, which includes the GL-matrices.
    Preferences
    A class for holding all settings of the application represented as key-value-pair.
    State
    Abstract class to represent and manage the current state of the depiction of the earth.
    StateManager  
    StateObservable
    A class implemented by the abstract class State in order to be observed by any class that implements the StateObserver interface.
    TileState
    Class to represent the current state of the earth in tile coordinates.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AbstractStateManager.StateType
    Enumerates all possible types of concrete states to be managed.
